COndor::

The pain that he felt was big... He was lost now!!! He only could 
trust that his friends would help him now... He didn't move and 
didn't speak. He only had to wait a chance to run away or wait for 
help.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Triggerhappy::
> 
>        Triggerhappy yanks Condor out with him from the hatch, then 
puts him
> on the ground.  Blowpipe turns back into Triggerhappy's compressed 
air
> cannon.  He kicks Condor in the side, and points Blowpipe at Condor.
> 
>         "You make one move, you die!" He said.
> 
>          Triggerhappy was getting eager to start firing his guns at 
the
> enemy.  Of course, the 'GRID' option was even dandier.
